Privacy Policy

  • Blog

Podcats uses Google AdSense. In this capacity, Google is a third-party vendor. Google uses cookies to serve the ads on the page, specifically the DoubleClick DART cookie. This cookie collects anonymous information.

The use of the cookie allows Google and partners to serve ads whose content are based on your visit to this and other sites on the Internet. You can opt out of the DART cookie by visiting the Google ad and content network privacy policy, which is in Polish for me for some reason but there you go.

That's all the collection of data we do here. Podcats do not collect any of your information whatsoever.
